scripts.start: cp src/environments/.env.mocked .env 2>/dev/null || copy src\environments\.env.mocked .env 2>nul & vite --mode mocked
scripts.start:local: cp src/environments/.env.local .env 2>/dev/null || copy src\environments\.env.local .env 2>nul & vite --mode local
scripts.start:dev: cp src/environments/.env.development .env 2>/dev/null || copy src\environments\.env.development .env 2>nul & vite --mode development
scripts.start:test: cp src/environments/.env.test .env 2>/dev/null || copy src\environments\.env.test .env 2>nul & vite --mode test
scripts.build:local: cp src/environments/.env.local .env 2>/dev/null || copy src\environments\.env.local .env 2>nul & tsc -b && vite build --mode local
scripts.build:dev: cp src/environments/.env.development .env 2>/dev/null || copy src\environments\.env.development .env 2>nul & tsc -b && vite build --mode development
scripts.build:test: cp src/environments/.env.test .env 2>/dev/null || copy src\environments\.env.test .env 2>nul & tsc -b && vite build --mode test
scripts.build:production: cp src/environments/.env.production .env 2>/dev/null || copy src\environments\.env.production .env 2>nul & tsc -b && vite build --mode production
